participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and dedicated, with a passion for music and event planning.
participant_1.background: I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir. I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced. Since I have fibromyalgia, the harsher winters here in PA will be rough on me. I enjoy crocheting in my spare time. My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Analytical and nurturing, with a love for learning and a deep appreciation for music.
participant_2.background: I am in good health and I take care of myself. I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars. I cherish my cello. My parents are in their 80s. I drive a Mercedes.

content.text: Hey! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am well too, thanks! I'm looking forward to a busy week ahead.
Oh, what do you have planned?
I have a lot of meetings with clients and I need to start practicing for choir.
That sounds like a lot of work, but it is also sounds rewarding!
It is! I love my job and I am excited to be a part of the choir.
Oh, that is so cool! I have always wanted to plan a wedding.
It is a lot of work, but it is very rewarding.
I bet it is! I imagine you get to meet all sorts of interesting people.
I do! I also get to see a lot of beautiful places.
